text: Hugh Gallagher may refer to: * Hugh Gallagher (advocate) (1933–2004), author and international disability advocate * Hugh Gallagher (humorist) (aka Von Von Von), author and humorist ==See also== * Hughie Gallacher (1903–1957), Scottish footballer * Hugh Gallacher (footballer, born 1870) (1870–1941), Scottish footballer
title: Hugh Gallagher
